stepOne.pseudoErrorFormat: The format of the entered nickname is invalid
stepOne.passwordErrorFormat: Warning, the password must contain at least 8 characters, a capital letter, a small letter and a number

page404.title: Oops! We are missing something ...
page404.subtitle: Looks like the page you tried to reach does not exist, or is temporarily unavailable.

login.connectInstruction: Enter your login details to be able to access all the features in one click.
login.noUser: These identifiers do not correspond to any account, please try again

changePassword.title: Forgotten password
changePassword.subtitle: Forgot your password? No problem! Enter the email associated with your MyPetsLife account below to receive a reset link.
changePassword.mailDoNotExist: This email address is not associated with any account
changePassword.instruction2: This is the first time you are accessing your account, so you must reset your password
changePassword.congratulation2: Your password has been changed, you can now connect to MyPetsLife with these new identifiers.
changePassword.wrongToken2: It seems that your token is invalid and your password cannot be changed with this link

forgotPassword.title: Password reset
forgotPassword.subtitle: Forgot your password? No problem! Enter the username associated with your MyPetsLife account below to receive a reset link by email.
forgotPassword.pseudoDoNotExist: This identifier is not associated with any account
forgotPassword.instruction1: Thank you for clicking on the link!
forgotPassword.instruction2: You can now enter your new password.
forgotPassword.congratulation2: Your password has been changed, you can now connect to MyPetsLife with these new identifiers.
forgotPassword.wrongToken2: It seems that your token is invalid and your password cannot be changed with this link
forgotPassword.confirmSend: An email has just been sent to:
forgotPassword.errorSend: Oops! Your reset link could not be sent

toaster.updateFailure: Your information has not been updated. Please try again.
toaster.addSuccess: Your adoption ad has been created.
toaster.addFailure: Your adoption ad was not created. Please try again.
toaster.adoptionSuccessTitle: This animal has already been adopted!
toaster.adoptionSuccess: You therefore cannot accept this file.
toaster.adoptionFailureTitle: A file is already in progress
toaster.adoptionFailure: Another file is already accepted, so you cannot accept this one.
toaster.deleteSuccess: The announcement has been successfully deleted
toaster.deleteFailure: The ad was not deleted. Please try again.
toaster.folderMailSuccess: An email has just been sent to the user!
toaster.folderMailFailure: There was a problem changing status. Please try again.
toaster.folderCommentSuccess: Your comment has just been updated!
toaster.folderCommentFailure: There was a problem changing your comment. Please try again.

errors.mailErrorFormat: Please enter a valid email address
errors.mailErrorExist: This email address is already associated with an account
errors.pseudoErrorExist: This username is already in use, please choose another
errors.passwordErrorFormat: Warning, the password must contain at least 8 characters, a capital letter, a lowercase letter and a number

adoption.name: Name
adoption.confirmUpdateStatus: Warning! You are going to modify a published ad: all users who have made an adoption request will be notified.
adoption.confirmUpdateStatus2: Are you sure you want to do this?
adoption.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this archived ad?
adoption.confirmDelete2: All information relating to this association (statistics and adoption requests) will also be deleted
adoption.confirmDelete3: This action is irreversible and no cancellation will be possible.

folders.acceptFolderMail: Mail of automatic service of acceptance of the file sent to the user:
folders.refuseFolderMail: Mail of automatic service of refusal of the file sent to the user:
folders.waitFolder: I put the folder on hold
folders.waitFolderMail: Auto-service waiting folder mail sent to user:
folders.haveOwnerAccord: With the agreement of its owner
folders.acceptParagraphOne: Would you like to accept this adoption request?
folders.acceptParagraphTwo: Be careful, you will not be able to accept other folders as long as this one is active.
folders.acceptParagraphThree: An email will be sent to the user concerned as soon as you validate your choice, if you are not sure that you want to do this, click on cancel.
folders.refuseParagraphOne: Would you like to refuse this adoption request?
folders.refuseParagraphThree: An email will be sent to the user concerned as soon as you validate your choice, if you are not sure whether you want to do this, click on cancel.
folders.waitTitle: Put the adoption request on hold
folders.waitParagraphOne: Would you like to put the adoption request on hold?
folders.waitParagraphThree: An email will be sent to the user concerned as soon as you validate your choice, if you are not sure you want to do this, click on cancel.
folders.userAcceptTitle: The adopter has accepted the adoption
folders.userAcceptParagraphOne: Would you like to definitively accept this file for this adoption request?
folders.userAcceptParagraphTwo: Please note, you will no longer be able to accept other folders.
folders.userAcceptParagraphThree: All other files will therefore automatically be rejected and the adoption will no longer be visible on your page.
folders.userRefuseParagraphOne: Would you like to point out that the adopter has withdrawn from their adoption request?
folders.userRefuseParagraphTwo: The file will then go into refused status.
folders.userRefuseParagraphThree: The other folders will not be affected, but you can accept another one.
